module Ringoid: sig
  module Basic
  module Operators
  module type S0 = sig
    type t
    val zero: t
    val one: t
    val negate: t -> t
    val add: t -> t -> t
    val substract: t -> t -> t
    val multiply: t -> t -> t
    val divide: t -> t -> t
    val square: t -> t
    val exponentiate: t -> int -> t
    module O: sig
      val (~+): t -> t
      val (~-): t -> t
      val (+): t -> t -> t
      val (-): t -> t -> t
      val (*): t -> t -> t
      val (/): t -> t -> t
      val (**): t -> int -> t
    end
  end
end
